room_title: Escape room "Hitler and The Spear of Destiny" by Escape History in Warren
review: My brothers a huge history buff and this was the first room we ever did at Escape History. Great place to start - really unique puzzles and they do a solid job of incorporating the story into what you're solving. I will definitely be back to try their other rooms soon.

room_title: Escape room "Hitler and The Spear of Destiny" by Escape History in Warren
review: Loved it... We did the Hitler room and escaped!! Will definitely be back to do the other rooms!
